slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-01.png
Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-01.png
slides.say:
North Metropolitan TAFE has more than a century-long
history,

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-02.png
slides.say:
from its humble beginnings as Western Australia’s first vocational training and education
provider in 1900 to currently the state’s largest TAFE.

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-03.png
slides.say:
We offer over 350 courses to 30,000 students across nine
contemporary campuses in Perth’s north

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-03.png
slides.say:
and north-
eastern metropolitan regions.

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-04.png
slides.say:
Whether you are just starting out in the workforce,
looking to upskill, change careers, or returning to work,
our nationally recognized courses

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-04.png
slides.say:
as well as
apprenticeships, traineeships, short courses, and skill
sets will help you meet your goal.

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-05.png
slides.say:
Our lecturers are highly experienced and connected to
industry, and each campus has the facilities,

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-05.png
slides.say:
equipment,
and technology that focus on preparing you to be job
ready.

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-06.png
slides.say:
Working closely with industry and employers, we use the
knowledge and understanding of changing business
models and contemporary

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-06.png
slides.say:
training techniques to provide
solutions to meet the current and future skill
requirements of individuals, industry, and the
community.

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-07.png
slides.say:
To this end, and responding to the rapidly growing field
in information technology and cyber security,

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-07.png
slides.say:
our wide-
ranging courses are tailored to endow you with the latest
knowledge and essential skills and training for a dynamic
career in:

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-08.png
slides.say: IT networking

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-09.png
slides.say: Programming

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-10.png
slides.say: Web development

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-11.png
slides.say: Data science and AI

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-12.png
slides.say: Cyber security

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-13.png
slides.say: Robotics control systems

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-14.png
slides.say:
To find out more about these courses, please speak to
our friendly lecturers and staff here or visit our website
at north metro tafe dot wa dot edu dot au

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-15.png
slides.say:
We also hope to see you at SupaNova Comic Con and
Gaming on the 28 th to 29 th of June and SkillsWest Career
and Employment Expo on the 24 th to 27 th of July.

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-16.png
slides.say:
At SupaNova, check us out to learn about the courses
that can help you get started or take your career to the
next level in the digital world of games, animation,
multimedia, visual effects, specialist make-up, and more.

slides.image: Isabella the Robot 1200x800px screen with text-17.png
slides.say:
Meet us at SkillsWest to explore your further education
options and new career possibilities, with our wide range
of courses, or get a taste of hands-on experience by
trying out our skill-based activities.
